hero.title: Institutionalize Expertise, Deliver Insights Faster
hero.subtitle: Organizations generate massive amounts of knowledge — in SharePoint, Google Drive, emails, research papers, and internal notes. Much of it remains scattered and underused. Knowledge Advisory connects to your enterprise knowledge sources, builds a dynamic knowledge graph, and delivers AI-powered insights on-demand so teams spend less time searching and more time advising.

features.title: An AI Built for Professionals
features.subtitle: More than a chatbot—Saras is a deep, domain-trained knowledge engine built for critical thinking and compliance.

items.title: Enterprise Knowledge Graph
items.description: Automatically connects your scattered documents, rulings, case files, and emails into a unified, navigable knowledge graph.

items.title: Unified Smart Search
items.description: Semantic search across SharePoint, Google Drive, emails, or any connected repository — with instant, contextual results.

items.title: AI-Powered Q&A
items.description: Ask questions in natural language and get precise, context-aware answers backed by your organization’s knowledge base.

items.title: Always Up-to-Date
items.description: Continuously syncs with internal repositories to capture the latest rulings, research, or knowledge contributions.

items.title: Collaborative Wisdom
items.description: Allows experts to annotate, enrich, and expand the knowledge base, institutionalizing expertise across teams.

items.title: Secure & Controlled Access
items.description: Enterprise-grade security ensures role-based access, so sensitive knowledge stays protected.

detailSection.title: Contextualized for Your Business
detailSection.description:
Knowledge Advisory transforms disconnected repositories into a living knowledge fabric:
  • Connect your SharePoint, Google Drive, emails, and internal databases.
  • AI ingests, classifies, and links data into a dynamic knowledge graph.
  • Advisors query in natural language and receive contextual, connected insights instantly.

cta.title: From scattered files to connected knowledge.
cta.subtitle: With Knowledge Advisory, your organization moves from static repositories to a dynamic knowledge graph. Empower your teams to find, connect, and apply insights — instantly and securely.
